newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Hong Kong sells out of Deng novelty watches.
newsitem.headline: Hong Kong sells out of Deng novelty watches.

text.p: Hong Kong socialite David Tang's upmarket store has sold out of Deng Xiaoping novelty watches, a sales assistant said on Thursday.
The watches, which feature a picture of Deng waving, retail at HK$390 ($50) each and are popular with tourists and Hong Kong residents.
China's paramount leader died late on Wednesday from respiratory failure. He was 92.
Tang's store ran out of the timepieces two days earlier when rumours mounted that Deng's health was fading.
"All sorts of people came to buy, both overseas and local, and they were sold out two days ago.
"A fresh batch will arrive on Saturday," a saleswoman at the watch counter told Reuters.
